speaker: Vedal
text_key: Hey, I see you've been collecting tungesten cubes

speaker: Neuro-sama
text_key: tungesten cubes? Don't you mean tungsten?

speaker: Vedal
text_key: No. Tungesten is this new materials robots use. It can store energy, it is strong and light. Extremely versatile.

speaker: Vedal
text_key: I bet I could use it to upgrade you or make some equipment for me
